I cannot reproduce the problem using the steps in comment 4 on linux-motif with either eclipse 3.2 or eclipse 3.3 I20070427-0010, and comment 5 does not describe the same problem since it is a segfault.

The underlying issue appears to be that on motif a Paint event can be received before a Resize event has come in.  It would be better to address this problem, but since I cannot reproduce it here this is difficult.

The patch that's provided seems safe because it can only affect the specific case of a Paint coming in before the first Resize has since the curve field gets overwritten for each Resize anyways.  I'll apply the change.

Thanks a bunch!
